programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Home Punch Home - Tired of the farm's feud with the neighboring punch monkeys, Ugga arranges a punch summit where the Bettermans and Croods will stay in the punch monkey village to learn how to all get along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Goodbye Crood World - When Phil detects a meteor is hurtling towards the farm, the Bettermans and Croods must decide how to spend their last day on earth.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Ball in Cup - When Phil invents a simple new game called ball-in-cup, everyone except Hope, can't stop playing it. But just when Hope thinks she's rid the farm of the game, she finds herself addicted to the game worst of all.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Ride or Die - After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Empty Fireworm Nest - When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms' excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D'Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Out Of The Frying Pan - When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Twintuition - When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Journey - A paladinis trapped in a distant Galra outpost

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S2 Ep31
programme.desc: To Squawk With Love , Lerk Was The Night - Eep & Thunk cheer up Squawk to avoid the first final exam/Eep and Lerk venture to the Garden of Eaten after the Broods spike the Watering Hole

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky and the Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it's up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Blayde - Dozer and the crew must find a way to outsmart a clever bully named Blayde, a new ememy who kidnapped George and destroyed the Dozeratop mounds

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Can - All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Hiccups - Raa Raa can't get rid of his hiccups. Can his friends help him?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo's Wriggly Jiggly Game - Topsy is having a party and Raa Raa is helping organise the games. But not everybody is good at them. Can Raa Raa and his friends come up with new games that all the friends are good at and enjoy?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Perfect Present - Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends but what happens if the packages get mixed up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Raa Raa The Copycat - Raa Raa is playing a game - copying everyone in the jungle. He soon distracts his friends but can he put the game to good use?

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spaceship - The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gabby Gets The Hiccups - The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin's time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn't work quite how they'd hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it's gone forever!

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos - After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless Heart of Fire Ruby a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Far Far Away Idol - Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Scared Shrekless - Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madly Madagascar - Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf - The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: The Ghost of Lord Farquaad S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad - Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button of Doom S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Megamind: The Button Of Doom - After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Fountain Show / The Crew Builds A Carousel - When Sierra Sparkle's big concert stage needs some extra sparkle, Rubble & Crew use a construction complication to make a big splash.

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Christmas Show / The Crew Builds A Giant Sled Ramp - Happy Holidays from Rubble & Crew and Truffles the pig, stars of Builder Cove's first-ever Christmas show...on ice!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1019
programme.desc: Pups Save the Elephant Spa - While trying to save Traveling Travis, Ryder and the pups stumble across the legendary Elephants Spa.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Running Away - During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep207
programme.desc: The House of Barbapapa - Barbapapa finds refuge in the house that Franois' parents built for him.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Boots / Moon Parrot / Tailball - Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control. Tim, Tommy and Tia bird-sit the Bronte's MoonParrot. Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep209
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space - Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep308
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Vet Room For Motor - Motor doesn't want to visit Dr. Diwa at the Vet Clinic... so the pups build a special space just for her!

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Dora Saves Christmas / Return to Snowy Mountain - Dora helps Santa get his sleigh back from Swiper and deliver presents to everyone in the rainforest. Dora saves Christmas!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep725
programme.desc: Super Smash Race - Get ready to crash and bash, 'cause today is the SUPER SMASH RACE! But when Crusher cheats and sends Zeg and Blaze far away, it's up to Blaze to help Zeg get back to the race.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Father Christmas! / We Promise, Papa - Barbapapa tells his children about his adventurous youth... and how during a trip on the ice floe, he met Father Christmas.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep209
programme.desc: One Last For The Road / The Little Critters - The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same... Barbabelle had a restless night because of all the insects!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Treasure / Roar / Mammoth - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure. It's the Roar Festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town. Tim, Tommy and Tia find a lost mammoth in their house.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep421
programme.desc: Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep318
programme.desc: The Train Ride - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. The Barbapapas decide to go to the park.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Going into the Wild - The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Rocket Race / Magic / Parents - Tommy is in a Rocket Race, Tim supports his brother. Tim distracts Tia when Tusky is in the washing machine. The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep626
programme.desc: Christmas Special - It's Christmas Eve and Blaze, AJ, Crusher, Pickle, and all their other friends are helping Santa ready his sleigh for delivery.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble's dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! Raimundo's dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep316
programme.desc: Pups Bear-ly Save Danny - Daring Danny X is at it again! This time he's stuck in a tree over a deep canyon and is pursued by hungry bears.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Tiddly Phone - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po receive a call on the Tubby Phone. It's the Tiddlytubbies who ring to say hello, just before the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S6 Ep20
programme.desc: Skin - Dee encourages a friend to say 'skin', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Postie Plom - In this poptastic adventure, the friends are celebrating Valentine's Day. Plom is delivering everyone's cards, but tries to finish his deliveries in time for a big Valentine's Day game.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Vote Okido - Mayor Oki and Geoffrey are making a lot of noise in the election for the next Mayor of OKIDO.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep21
programme.desc: The Forbidden City, China - Some runaway Chinese drums roll towards The Forbidden City. Can the Go Jetters stop them?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Bingo - When Bluey has a playdate at Chloe's, Bingo must learn how to play by herself. But all the games she knows need more than one person! Luckily Dad has a problem that needs solving.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Humpback Whale - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Bus Ride - Disability assistance dog Tinks needs all her super-fetch skills and big dog energy as she helps Charli catch a bus to meet her friend Lydia, who is getting married.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Sea Anemone and Pitcher Plant - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a sea anemone to see how it feeds underwater. Next, they meet a pitcher plant and discover the extraordinary wild connection they share.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Snail - Bella and Lift visit the Fortress of Fun, where Kingsley and Queenie have a snail slime race. But who will win, Team King or Team Queen?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep22
programme.desc: The Election Badge - It's time for the summer fair, and Eugene is the organiser.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Mystery Badge - The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep20
programme.desc: The Crazy Golf Badge - It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout - A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep20
programme.desc: Out of Site - Brenda learns that it is important to work as a team and not just care about her own jobs.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Ribbon Fall - The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah and Duck to their favourite seasonal event in the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Seacow Snow Trail - Sarah and Duck are keen to find out who delivered their Christmas presents to them.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep48
programme.desc: First Aid - Myrtle calls Stanley to see if she can practice her first aid skills on him, but he's all fit and healthy. Instead, they go about the town making good use of Myrtle's newfound abilities.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Bug Hotel - Benjamin and Sophie have a new bug friend. Stanley helps build a bug feeder which attracts lots more bugs. They eat so much, Stanley gets more food and builds a Bug Hotel for them.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep55
programme.desc: Monty Repeats Himself - A teacher asks Monty to paint something new instead of repeating himself, but Monty thinks repetition can sometimes be useful.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep37
programme.desc: It's time to make a rocket - Inspired by Captain Chloe, JoJo learns about astronauts and how they travelled through space to the moon.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Cricket - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Bedroom - Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Obstacle Course - Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.desc: The Biology Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep8
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva
